titleStmt.title: The divine poem of Musæus. First of all bookes. Translated according to the originall, by Geo: Chapman
De Herone et Leandro. English
titleStmt.author: Musaeus, Grammaticus.
Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

notesStmt.note: A verse translation, by George Chapman, of Musæus' De Herone et Leandro.
With caption title, reading: Musaeus of Hero and Leander.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
